kennethreitz/flask-sockets

kennethreitz/flask-socketsCheck this out:

from flask import Flask from flask_sockets import Sockets

app = Flask(name) sockets = Sockets(app)

@sockets.route(‘‘/echo’’) def echo_socket(ws): while True: message = ws.receive() ws.send(message)

@app.route(‘’/’’) def hello(): return ‘‘Hello World!’’
